title: Halo: Campaign Evolved: Release date rumors, platforms, and everything else we know about the Halo remake
description: Master Chief is returning in 2026 with a ground-up remake of the original Halo that's promising new content on top of a totally remade presentation.
content: Master Chief is returning in 2026 with a ground-up remake of the original Halo that's promising new content on top of a totally remade presentation.
